Package ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda.provisioners

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BwProvisioner
    This implementation of the bandwidth provisioner allows a more fine allocation of resources.
    BwProvisionerSimple
    BwProvisionerSimple is a class that implements a simple best effort allocation policy: if there is bw available to request, it allocates, otherwise, it fails.
    RamProvisioner
    This implementation of the bandwidth provisioner allows a more fine allocation of resources.
    RamProvisionerSimple
    RamProvisionerSimple is an extension of RamProvisioner which uses a best-effort policy to allocate memory to a VM.
    StorageIOProvisioner
    StorageIOProvisioner is an abstract class that represents the provisioning policy of storageIO to virtual machines inside a Host.
    StorageIOProvisionerSimple
    storageIOProvisionerSimple is a class that implements a simple best effort allocation policy: if there is storageIO available to request, it allocates; otherwise, it fails.
